oai_dc:dc.dcterms:title: Alberta Survey, May 27-July 16, 2010
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:creator: Stevens, Gillian
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:subject: Quality of Life
Household Survey
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:description: This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore a wide range of topics in a structured research framework and environment. Sponsors'Ã‚™ research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households.
